lom:description.lom:string:
A set of lecture notes on ceramics in PDF format from the University of Virginia. It is part of a class on Introduction to the Science and Engineering of Materials.
The lecture notes provide a brief introduction to the properties and applications of ceramics. Typical processing techniques are explained along with typical ceramic properties and their applications. The notes briefly cover ceramic annealing and tempering heat treatments and the reasons for their use.

lom:title.lom:string: Applications and Processing of Ceramics : Chapter 14 : Introduction to Materials Science
